General.Name: Syntec Construction Public Company Limited
General.Description: Syntec Construction Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in real estate development and construction activities in Thailand. The company undertakes residential, commercial, industrial, institutional, leisure, piling, retail, and infrastructure projects. It is also involved in the real estate development for apartment service and rental; purchases and installs sanitary, electrical, pipeline and air conditioning systems; management of hotels, service apartments, and other properties; and provision of consulting services. The company was formerly known as Siam Syntech Construction Public Company Limited and changed its name to Syntec Construction Public Company Limited in April 2004. The company was incorporated in 1988 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.
